Package Cineplex

Class AllCineplex

java.lang.Object
Service.Settings
Cineplex.AllCineplex
public class AllCineplex extends Settings
* @author CHEW ZHI QI, GAN HAO YI * This is the Admin class inherits from Settings. It stores list of cineplex,list of movies and settings for the user.

    • getCineplexes

      public ArrayList<Cineplex> getCineplexes()
      Get Method
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Cineplex

    • setListOfMovies

      public void setListOfMovies(ArrayList<Movie> listOfMovies)
      Set Method
      Parameters:
      listOfMovies - - Set the List of Movies the Cineplexes are showing

    • InitializeCineplexes

      public void InitializeCineplexes() throws IOException
      This method initializes the cineplex. It reads the cineplex names stored and load it into the Cineplex ArrayList.
      Throws:
      IOException - to check if Cineplexes exist in Database

    • addMovies

      public void addMovies(Movie movie) throws IOException
      This method adds new movies created by Admin to Global list of movies and updates the database.
      Parameters:
      movie - - Newly created movie to be added.
      Throws:
      IOException - - Checks if Movie Database exists.

    • getListOfMoviesforAdmin

      public ArrayList<Movie> getListOfMoviesforAdmin()
      This method returns full list of movies including Coming Soon and End Of Showing Movies.
      Returns:
      List of All Movies.

    • getListOfMovies

      public ArrayList<Movie> getListOfMovies()
      This method gets a list of filtered movie excluding Coming Soon and End Of Showing Movies.
      Returns:
      Filtered list of movies, only show Preview and Now Showing status.

    • updateListOfMovies

      public void updateListOfMovies(int index, Movie movie) throws IOException
      This method updates the list of movie with the latest updates changed by Admin.
      Parameters:
      index - - Index of the movie that was changed.
      movie - - Movie that was changed.
      Throws:
      IOException - - Check if movie database exists.

    • removeMovie

      public void removeMovie(int index, Movie movie) throws IOException
      This method changes the Showing Status of a movie into a EndOfShowing Status. It will not be displayed anymore unless edited by Admin.
      Parameters:
      index - - Index of Movie in a list of all movies.
      movie - - Selected movie to be removed from Showing Status.
      Throws:
      IOException - - Exception if movie database does not exist.

    • printSortedList

      public void printSortedList(AllCineplex.MovieSort movieSort)
      This method prints the sorted list of movie according to Rating / Sales
      Parameters:
      movieSort - - A sorted ArrayList of the Top 5 Movies

    • displayCineplexList

      public void displayCineplexList()
      This Method displays the list of cineplex(Branches) available.

    • createCustomerAccount

      public void createCustomerAccount(Customer customer) throws IOException
      This method adds a newly created customer account into the database.
      Parameters:
      customer - - New customer
      Throws:
      IOException - - Exception if opening customers.txt has error.

    • displayMovieList

      public static void displayMovieList(ArrayList<Movie> list)
      This Method displays the List of Movies currently available. User will only see Movie Title. After this method, user will be able to select which movie to display more details.
